thread.title: Associate says Blatter hopes to be back within 10 days
thread.title_full: Associate says Blatter hopes to be back within 10 days

title: Associate says Blatter hopes to be back within 10 days
text:
> Top News Associate says Blatter hopes to be back within 10 days FILE - In this Wednesday Oct. 24, 2012, file photo Confederation of African Football (CAF) president Issa Hayatou attends the final draw of the Orange Africa Cup Of Nations in Durban South Africa. FIFA said Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015 that African soccer leader Isaa Hayatou will serve as acting president. (AP Photo) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
